name: datadive
0:
”Alexa open data dive”
”help”
”turn right thirty degrees”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: data dive
des:
This skill maps three numeric columns of data from a CSV file into a 1000 x 1000 x 1000 cube which you can explore using voice navigation. Scaled values are shown in a display that tracks your location and heading through the 3D space. The data points are mapped as small spheres in space.

Instructions include:
1) "go" to move forward
2) "full stop" to stop the changing location
3) "scan" to list data points in your viewport
4) "labels on" (or "off") to label data points with their row number from the CSV

You can "turn" left or right or up or down. You can also say, "go to" a row number to jump to a specific data point's location. You can also "roll" left or right if you want to change your perspective.

You can turn off the displays or the compass if you want. They are off by default for very small screens.

This skill is much harder to use without a display!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
